name: Empress of Gold
description: 1336, Feudal Japan. The player takes on the role of a ninja, out for vengeance against a corrupt Nobel. Maybe the Empress of Gold can help restore balance, unless she's already captured.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/7/Vista/XP PC (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Intel or AMD New Generation Dual Core 2.0GHz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 8800 or ATI 3850 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 263 MB available space
